author: mann-david
body:
The underlying library that provides JSON Schema support  (Test-Json)(https://github.com/RicoSuter/NJsonSchema) doesn't support either of the latest 2 drafts of JSON Schema, which is problematic as there were significant changes since v4 (the last it supports).

Can this support be added?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: @iSazonov is this covered under the pending move to System.Text.Json or is the .NET implementation also missing that functionality?

comments.author: mann-david
comments.body: I dont see schema support in System.Text.Json, but could have missed it

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Tracking issue in .Net Runtime https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/29887
Current status - it is not planned for .Net 5.0.

As for the request, we use NJsonSchema so you should ask the support there.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Feature Request: Support for JSON Schema Draft 2019-09
